hero.title: Manage Your Library

borrowingTracking.description: Keep track of who has borrowed what and when they need to return it.

inventoryManagement.description: Maintain a clear overview of your library's inventory and stock levels.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Stay informed about due dates, overdue books, and other important updates.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Our system is designed to be user-friendly and accessible for all.

about.title: Simplify Your Library Operations
about.description: Our comprehensive library management system helps you organize, track, and optimize your library's resources and services.

footer.aboutDescription: BookOrbit is dedicated to revolutionizing library management with cutting-edge technology and user-friendly solutions.
